Articles.Content:
I wanted to start a new RSS sandbox, and wanted to transfer a ship from 1 to the other.   WIthout thinking my new career overwrote the other one, thus when i went to copy and paste it was no longer there.

am i SOL with that craft gone forever?  Or is there some place i might find it.   it took a while to build since my real world boosters doesnt have nodes on the bottom of engines, making placing the lander inside much more frustrating.
What OS are you on? There is a chance that some of your subdirectories may have ended up in your trashcan/recycle bin. How long ago did you do the overwrite?

26 minutes ago, bewing said:

What OS are you on? There is a chance that some of your subdirectories may have ended up in your trashcan/recycle bin. How long ago did you do the overwrite?

it was like 2 hours ago.. its windows but TBO im not sure, i think its 8.1

I just checked my rec bin and its not there.  Oh well thats a mistake i dont think ill be making again.. lol
I don't suppose you have Norton Utilities? Often that can recover a dead file.
